DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study determine self-administered semi-quantitative urine pregnancy test telephone pregnancy symptom questionnaire reduce percentage woman complete uterine evacuation require clinic lab visit confirm completion . The investigator hypothesize woman complete uterine evacuation less likely require follow-up clinic lab visit use standardized pregnancy questionnaire home SQ-UPT , use serum hCG objective measure completion .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Semi-Quantitative Urine Pregnancy Test Pregnancy Questionnaire After Uterine Evacuation Undesired Pregnancy Uncertain Location
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 year old undesired pregnancy < 6 week gestation Women positive urine pregnancy test Proficiency English Working phone subject willing contact phone . Agreeing survey regard demographic , followup preference , satisfaction assign followup method Women presence yolk sac crown rump length visualize ultrasound Women gestational sac great 13mm [ 11 ] High Suspicion ectopic pregnancy Sign : Concerning adnexal mass see ultrasound conjunction pelvic pain and/or vaginal spot Hemodynamic instability Signs : heavy vaginal bleeding , hypotension , tachycardia Pelvic Infection Signs : pain fever Medical condition contraindicate uterine evacuation accord PPLM clinic policy These include limited : bleeding disorder anticoagulation , significant cardiac disease , renal liver failure , IUD situ remove Unwilling unable comply study followup procedure Being situation receive phone call additional contact research staff may endanger privacy safety subject ( e.g . situation domestic violence abuse ) Inability give inform consent Previous participation study
